name: Dragonview
description: Warrior! Open your Eyes! This is the future of Gaming! Look. Before you leap. This isn't some corny collection of cardboard dungeons and dragons. It's a brilliant new vision of RPG Action Adventure. With Real-time 16 Meg 3D Scrolling like you've never seen. Plus an incredible Hero's Eye View of the danger.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4, Athlon 64 or later Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later Storage: 256 MB available space
